import React from 'react' import { CollapseIcon, CheckIcon, InProgressIcon } from '../../asset/icons/box/index.js'; import { Buttons, Progress } from '../../components'; import './boxes.css' const Boxes = ({ order, estimatedTime, total, items, orderStatus, buttonStatus }) => { return (

Order: #{order}

Estimate Time: {estimatedTime} mins

Total: {total}

Food item(s): {items}

{/* arrow icon */}
{/* progress bar */}
{/* Button */}
{/* content */}
content
) } export default Boxes
